column5: Just read that bigfoot was sighted by some berry pickers. I don't fish around Grassy Narrows, but I'm guessing he's only about 40 miles as the bigfoot walks from Ear Falls. http://www.foxnews.com/story/0,2933,393301,00.html I'm not too worried unless he comes after my Molson or my minnows. Either way, he'd be in trouble.
Not to worry- They found him in Georgia Google bigfoot to find the story.
There are a lot of sightings. We were at a native gathering at a provincial park and an elder recalled several sightings he had made.
This story was on the front page of the local paper a while back.
My Mother In Law was in the area that day. Said she got scared by a pickup truck with two female berry pickers in it.
